spec_data.Name: koan
spec_data.Description:
Koan stands for kickstart-over-a-network and allows for both
network installation of new virtualized guests and reinstallation
of an existing system.  For use with a boot-server configured with Cobbler
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 02 Oct 2017 12:35:25 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Helper tool that performs cobbler orders on remote machines
